body_html:
yes, I tested this against hadoop 2.6.4 running on a linux box.
Tried to read files for training as well as save() / restore() - worked all ok (actually cool that gfile works).
The biggest hurdle is that you need the hadoop binaries on the windows side and there is no good binary distribution.

body:
yes, I tested this against hadoop 2.6.4 running on a linux box. 
Tried to read files for training as well as save() / restore() - worked all ok (actually cool that gfile works).
The biggest hurdle is that you need the hadoop binaries on the windows side and there is no good binary distribution.
